Summary: Three star like objects moving in unison.
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst object appeared as a bright start moving south to north. The object turned and it's intrinsic brightness increased to equal that of Venus. The object continued north and again turned. It began to dim until it disappeared from sight. A second object appeared from behind a tree. The second object was equally as bright as the first. It continued north until is disappeared over the horizon. The second object was followed by a third and much dimmer companion.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Taylorsville
There were no other sightings in Taylorsville on or around July 6th 2009
